name: CLOUDBIRD
description:
CLOUDBIRD Another PICO-8 game from me

I'm back but only in the sense that I made something just about worth sharing! Tonight I streamed a little bit of game dev messing to some friends who were curious, and because of the tools I use, PICO-8 is probably the most obscure, I showed them PICO-8 from scratch. And I had a lot of fun doing it! Friends? They're good actually.

Game concept

You're a bird gliding over some nice flowers, but there are clouds. You should avoid the clouds or you'll punch a hole right through them! Don't worry though, it doesn't do anything bad.

Controls

Left and right arrows to move the bird
